descriptions.overview: Grill burgers, sear steaks, and sauté veggies on a grill that’s big enough to do it all. Perfectly grilled food is the mission from the Genesis II E-435. Everything from a world class grilling engine to an outstanding 10 year warranty on all parts of the grill sets you up to be a backyard hero. It’s equipped with Premium features such as porcelain-enameled, cast-iron cooking grates that retain heat and are easy to clean. The tuck-away warming rack keeps food warm while the main dish grills underneath.
list: Weber Genesis® II E-435 liquid propane gas grill in black with GS4 high performance grilling system
Four stainless steel main burners with 48,000 BTU-per-hour input allow you to grill up to 28 burgers. use the 12,000 BTU-per-hour input side burner to simmer BBQ sauce or saut veggies
Porcelain-enameled, cast-iron cooking grates provide even heat distribution across the entire grilling surface and superior heat retention

Tuck-away™ warming rack provides 198 square inches of extra grilling space and keeps food warm, or toasts buns, while the main course finishes grilling on the grate. fold it down when not in use for easy storage
The infinity ignition is guaranteed to ignite. rest assured that you’ll be up-and-grilling the first time, every time
Side table with integrated tool hooks can keep platters and seasonings within arm’s reach. hang your essential grilling tools on the hooks for easy access and organization of your backyard workspace
Mounting the gas tank to the outside of the grill makes it easier to access and remove. the fuel gauge lets you see how much fuel is left in the tank (LP only). grill is not able to be converted
The iGrill 3 app-connected thermometer monitors food from beginning to end, displaying the real-time temperature on your mobile device. (Accessory sold separately)
10 year warranty, 100% Weber guarantee promises that should your grill have any manufacturing defects within 10 year time frame, the part will be replaced at no charge to you

specs.title: Natural Gas or Convertible to NG
Assembly Option
specs.spec: No Thanks - I'll Assemble it (Ship free to my address)

reviews.title: "Ultimate Weber grill"
reviews.text: Weber has created a masterpiece. This grill is truly amazing. I've cooked on this grill several times since it was Assembled and delivered by Lowes three days ago.  Everything that you cook on this grill turns out with grill marks and tons of flavor. I'm so happy I spent several hundred dollars more for this four burner masterpiece.  There is tons of cooking space to cook for 20 people.  I will be a lifelong Weber fan.  The best part about this grill is, it makes you look like you are a serious Grillmaster!!  Thanks Weber!!
reviews.author: FamilyDad

reviews.title: "Enjoying the grill, I'd change a few design featur"
reviews.text: We bought the grill two months ago and have used it a dozen times already between my wife and I. I don't like the side shelves not having a insert tray to protect the stainless steel. Plastic end caps on the shelves are cheap looking. The doors open too far and can become scratched when opened all the way- should have stops. The scale mechanism for the tank isn't very accurate and can get scratched by the propane tank. Grill looks great and easily heats up to 510 degrees F. Left side wheels are too small and makes it tough to push on a wood deck. Side burner has been very useful and heats up quickly.
reviews.author: DWish27

reviews.title: "Awesome Grill!"
reviews.text: So far the best grill I have ever bought!  It's a little steep in price, but I hope it will last longer than other grills that I have purchased in the past!
reviews.author: Ed

reviews.title: "The Best Grill"
reviews.text:
I've used a Weber for thirty years...great grills and admirable support.  Now I've purchased the Genesis II E-435.  It exceeds expectations.   First, it has Four main vertical burners, an additional burner between burner three and four to create a "searing" section.  Also, Hot plate type burner on the right side.
The only thing it needs, is a place for my iGrill.
I found a place where a plastic plate had an iGrill Decal.   I attached a magnet there with 3M tape and it's perfect for the iGrill.  Wish Weber had a Metal plate to put there as the iGrill has a magnetic bottom.
reviews.author: Brudaniell

reviews.title: "Truly awesome"
reviews.text:
This is an awesome grill. I bought this one for the lake house. I prefer the natural gas because I don't have to stop in the middle of cooking because I ran out of LP. I have the summit at home which is also natural gas .... in my opinion the only way to go assuming you get a gas line outside 
It did take a little to put together but it is soooooo worth it. 
Trust me ....for me to take the time to write a review ITS SO WORTH EVERY PENNY
I wouldn't buy anything but a Weber. Don't be fooled with the other products on the market. They will not hold up like a Weber does
reviews.author: BBQ GUY 10

reviews.title: "Poor choice"
reviews.text: The burners heat unevenly resulting in poor cooking. Worse yet, the grease builds up as the drain is poorly designed and fires start while cooking burning everything.
reviews.author: larry

reviews.title: "Great Product but Assembly is intensive"
reviews.text: I purchased the grill online and the option to have it assembled was not available.
reviews.author: RK

reviews.title: "Take your grilling to another level!"
reviews.text: This is my fourth Weber Genesis grill.  I grill year round which can be a challenge in the Minnesota north.  This grill is amazing.  The new flame bars throw very consistent heat and there are almost no flare ups to contend with.  Grilling is more consistent and predictable regardless of the weather.  If you're hesitating, don't because this grill is going to provide at least 10-15 years of cooking pleasure.
reviews.author: Nosmada1

reviews.title: "Best grill period!"
reviews.text: I've had this grill for several months now and I have to say, it's beyond excellent! I have cooked baby back ribs, hamburgers, grilled pineapple, peppers you name it and everything cooked even and perfect.   I wouldn't buy anything else for my grilling needs.  I love this grill and hope it lasts many years.  Can't wait to use it again.  I would highly recommend this 4 burner beauty!
reviews.author: Grilling Masterpiece

reviews.title: "Great upgade"
reviews.text: Replacing a 10+ year old gas grill.(Yes an older Weber Brand ).  Got the I-Grill attachment just for fun, and man is it spot on. Have tried it on beef, pork, and chicken, all came out perfect. Biggest different from older grill is that the fire is a little deeper from grill so it does take a little longer to cook, but who counting mins. Time for another beer or cocktail.
reviews.author: Paccigar

reviews.title: "Great, even cooking"
reviews.text:
3 weeks in and fantastic all the way around.  The best evenness of cooking and a great seared meats with that added control feature. 

The assembly instructions are extremely good on the app. And highly recommended to supplement the booklet.

Previous grill for 12 years was a high end Vermont Castings and this one seems equal to or better.
reviews.author: Randyg711

reviews.title: "Great Features and Quality"
reviews.text: I've had this unit for almost two month. It was purchased to replace my well used 19 year-old Genesis!  My new Genesis has more cooking space and more features (searing), inter alias. I really enjoy cooking a complete meal with all my vegetables, meats and pineapple at one time with them all being ready to eat at the same time!!
reviews.author: Les123

reviews.title: "Not worth money ?"
reviews.text: This grill is very disappointing I made a mistake had  10 yr old 3 burner Weber loved it ! My wife wanted to buy me a new grill for my birthday !  To much grill for me and hate the design not a fan of the cooking grates either ? Heating is not even Don't grill as much as I used to !  Last Weber I ever buy !!
reviews.author: None 2

reviews.title: "Very sturdy grill"
reviews.text: Assembled this in 2hours. All parts fit very easily together. Still getting used grill with it. Only concern I have is it seems to burn a lot of LP. I was going to use it Memorial Day weekend and had to get another tank because the gauge read that it was almost empty. I had only used it a few times.
reviews.author: RT1974

reviews.title: "Greatest Grill Ever!"
reviews.text: Although we spent some money on this grill to replace a less expensive box store grill, it was MORE than worth the money.  We never knew what we were missing until we got this.  Every day we try to figure out what we're grilling! Assembly was time consuming, but the BILT app was incredibly helpful.
reviews.author: jaywoo

reviews.title: "A Solid Grill"
reviews.text: This is my second Weber and is another solid grill. It's simple but has all the features I need. Heats up nice and evenly, maintains temperatures and although I've seen reviews suggesting it doesn't get hot enough I have to differ because, mine gets plenty hot. I'm truly liking this grill a lot.
reviews.author: Tim2

reviews.title: "Peerless"
reviews.text:
Without question my Weber Genesis II E-435 is the finest grill I have ever owned, and I have owned many grills.
It renders well charred tender ribeye steaks, and fall off the bone Smokey ribs as well as any thing you like.
Good job Weber. I don't like my eggs green anyway.
reviews.author: MichaelF

reviews.title: "I could not be more pleased with our 435 Gas grill"
reviews.text: This grill replaced our 25 year old Weber 3 burner grill. We were a family of four 25 years ago, now we're a family of 11, we needed more space and fire power and we now have it in our new grill. They quality and reliabibility of Weber made buying another one a no brainer.
reviews.author: grillpower

reviews.title: "last grill"
reviews.text: if i could keep an inexpensive grill for 15 yrs im sure this grill will last me a life time. i have this grill for a month and im still trying to get used to it without hot spots, huge flare ups, uneven cooking. theres no battling just grilling. great grill thus far
reviews.author: paintpro

reviews.title: "I Love This Grill"
reviews.text: I was given my first Genesis grill hand-me-down by my father law 10 years ago, after he had used it for 10 years.  I loved using that grill and recently decided it was time to get myself a new one.  I have had this for 6 months or so now and love it.
reviews.author: adr3937

reviews.title: "What Grilling should be"
reviews.text: Couldnt be happier with the grill.  We use it every week now. My biggest issue is all the extra family and friends coming over for cookouts.  I need a bigger grill.  And with the Weber grill grate cleaner it still looks like new
reviews.author: IndyRobert

reviews.title: "Owner"
reviews.text: I wanted a Weber Grill for a long time. My girlfriend surprised me with one and even got me the iGrill with the 3 probes. Was not a problem to assemble and is making me look like I know how to grill. This is a great product.
reviews.author: thomcruise

reviews.title: "Awesome grill"
reviews.text:
I received this for early Father's Day gift.
Assembly was easy except for the ground and igniter wires being tucked up inside the side burner. It would have helped mentioning this in the instructions.
It works perfectly!
reviews.author: Tom l

reviews.title: "Simplicity"
reviews.text: Purchased from our local hardware store where assembly and install were included in the cost. All features were clearly explained and the grill has been absolute simplicity to use. We love it and use almost daily.
reviews.author: hpecht

reviews.title: "i Have been a Weber fan for 30 hrs."
reviews.text: I finally decided it's time to retire my old Weber to be rebuilt for my daughter and upgrade to a larger unit. I have always been a fan of my Weber and prefer it over my pellet smoker for best results.
reviews.author: fan of the flame

reviews.title: "Best Grill Ever!"
reviews.text: In all the years I have been buying grills, this is by far the best ever. Solidly built, easy to use, dependable and creator of great food. I'm sure it will last for years to come. Thank you Weber!
reviews.author: Kerndigg

reviews.title: "Great food prep"
reviews.text: We bought this version as it's a great fit for our home. The grill allows us to cook more food than we could with our Weber kettle grill. The temperature stays even throughout our cooking.
reviews.author: JasperTim

reviews.title: "Awesome grill"
reviews.text: Awesome grill, plenty of room for grilling several items at a time! Love the side burner. I got over twenty years of use out of my last Weber, and I'm still using it.
reviews.author: Cajun Curt

reviews.title: "Really great grill!"
reviews.text: The grill was fun to assemble. It gave me satisfaction to do this myself with great care. The grill is easy to start and fast heating.  I really couldn't be happier.
reviews.author: Mj mcq

reviews.title: "Great Grill!"
reviews.text: Assembly has a lot of parts, but was not difficult.  Well worth the time putting it together.  High quality grill.  Cooking on this Weber grill is a pleasure.
reviews.author: Happy Customer!

reviews.title: "What Grilling should be"
reviews.text: Couldnt be happier with the grill.  We use it every week now. My biggest issue is all the extra family and friends coming over for cookouts.  I need a bigger grill.  And with the Weber grill grate cleaner it still looks like new

reviews.text: Assembly has a lot of parts, but was not difficult.  Well worth the time putting it together.  High quality grill.  Cooking on this Weber grill is a pleasure.
reviews.author: Happy Customer!

reviews.title: "Solid construction"
reviews.text: I've used the grill several times. Works great. Maintains a consistent temperature
reviews.author: Paulie B

reviews.title: "Does not get hot enough. Takes 25% longer to cook"
reviews.text: I wish I had my Weber genisis 3 burner back. This grill does not get hot enough
reviews.author: Steven819

reviews.title: "Fantastic grill"
reviews.text: I replaced my 20 year old Weber grill even though it was still working
reviews.author: Bsbs

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hello! Yes, this model has a 10 year warranty on all components. Thanks!

questions.question: "Can I add rotisserie to this grill?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hello! Yes, you'll want rotisserie # 7653, and you can find it at the link below. Thanks! https://www.lowes.com/pd/Weber-Genesis-II-49-25-in-Stainless-Steel-Grill-Rotisserie/1000240981

questions.question: "Can I convert it to natural gas?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hello, due to safety considerations, Weber grills cannot be converted from propane to natural gas, or vice versa. Attempting to convert a Weber grill will void the warranty on the unit. However, we do make a natural gas ready version of this model. It goes by model # 67016001, and you can find it here: https://www.lowes.com/pd/Weber-Genesis-II-E-435-Black-4-Burner-Natural-Gas-Grill-1-Side-Burner/1000704852

questions.question: "How can I use military discount on line"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hello, please reach out directly to Lowe's customer service regarding pricing and discount related matter. Thanks!

questions.question: "Does this model have the option of adding a rotisserie?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hello! Yes, you'll want rotisserie kit # 7653. Thanks!

questions.question: "WHAT IS THE OVER ALL LENGTH FROM SIDE ARM TO SIDE BURNER?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hello! This model is 65" from the outside edges of the left and right side tables. Thanks!

questions.question: "Is the tank exposed from the front or back? I would like it completely enclosed."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hello, the tank is exposed on the right hand side, and is masked by a tank panel in the front and the back. It is not possible to completely enclose the tank on this model. Currently, our Summit series propane models and Spirit 200 and 300 series models have fully enclosed tanks storage locations. Thanks!

questions.question: "Are the stainless steel grates interchangeable with the cast iron. Can I buy the stainless steel grates as an accessory?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hello! Yes, we do make stainless steel grates that will fit this model. They are part # 66089. Please reach out to us at 1-800-446-1071. Thanks!

questions.question: "Could I plumb this grill to my LP gas line coming off my home tanks?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hello! Please reach out to us at reviews@weberstephen.com and we can discuss information related to connecting to a bulk propane system. Thanks!

questions.question: "Can your lp version be switched to natural gas at a later time? Or do I have to buy the natural gas version?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: WeberGrills
answers.text: Hi! Due to the complexity of the technology and gas train components and the level of disassembly that would have to be performed, we are not allowing conversions or offering kits. Thanks!
